name: Weird Dream 2007
description:
Old artwork I made and I kept it for a long time.

14 Years ago, right after I moved to new place, I had this weird dream. 
I was in a place, like a playground in a small field.
I forgot most of it but I clearly remember this scene, everything feels familiar, the field, grasses,
some of iron nets and a view.

There's a little girl wearing pink dress pointed to her friend who play stick. That boy wearing something
like a walkman. Everything I saw its similar with 90's era.

This little girl staring at me, sometimes she's smiling but she kept staring.
Can't tell this is a nightmare or what but I'm pretty sure I was terrified of this dream.

I woke up around 3-4 AM , take a piss and drink a glass of water.
I sit and trying to remember every second of what I've dreamt of

This artwork is all I remember.


Weeks later, near my house, I noticed something. I can see a view with Salak mountain at the back.
Then there's neighbor's garage. It's pretty simple-open garage with old stuff there. 

Long story short, I was asking my other neighbor about "is there a small field around here sometime ago?"
And he said "Yes, there was a small field there (pointed to the neighbor garage)"
Then he added "back then kids used to play at that small field."


Hmm, okay.
